name: Playtime helps Baldi
description:
Story: Playtime was tired of students cutting her jump rope so she asked Baldi if she can help him catch the students. Baldi agreed so he gave playtime a frying pan so she can use it to knock you out. 1st prize is in principal's office charging his battery.

Credits:

Porky powers for voicing Baldi, Gotta sweep and filename2. also for the playtime sprite.

Mystman12 for the original game.

feulfire for voicing playtime.

Splinta dinta for the Baldi model.

Super inky for the bully model.

BarnerrorBE for helping me with the 1st prize motor sound.
